document_data.mainbody: '''Ornwindsea''' was a wealthy [[human]] merchant family of self-styles nobles of [[Selgaunt]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, the Ornwindsea family was one of the patrons of the famed scuttling [[dwarf]] sculptor â€“ [[Orgelna Highshield]] of Selgaunt, alongside the [[Bowsuntide]] family of human merchant nobles.
